questDescription->We have intercepted a signal from an old JCJenson hub.

Status: [threatDescription]

Valuable salvage may be present.
threatDescription->The hub bears signs of a rushed evacuation; sentinels still patrol—deadly to worker drones and androids, their targeting arrays corrupted and increasingly hostile to humans.
threatDescription->Locked down after an unknown emergency, the facility's guardians are malfunctioning relics—relentless toward service bots and unpredictably aggressive toward intruders.
